flavor_text_entries.red:
A POKéMON that
consists entirely
of programming code. Capable of
moving freely in
cyberspace.
flavor_text_entries.blue:
A POKéMON that
consists entirely
of programming code. Capable of
moving freely in
cyberspace.
flavor_text_entries.yellow:
The only POKéMON
people anticipate
can fly into space. None has
managed the feat
yet, however.
flavor_text_entries.gold:
It is a manmade
POKéMON. Since it
doesn't breathe, people are eager
to try it in any
environment.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
A manmade POKéMON
that came about as
a result of re­ search. It is pro­
grammed with only
basic motions.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
An artificial
POKéMON created
due to extensive research, it can
perform only what
is in its program.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
PORYGON is capable of reverting itself
entirely back to program data and
entering cyberspace. This POKéMON is copy-protected so it
cannot be duplicated by copying.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
PORYGON is capable of reverting itself
entirely back to program data and
entering cyberspace. This POKéMON is copy-protected so it
cannot be duplicated by copying.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
It is capable of reverting itself entirely
back to program data in order to enter
cyberspace. A PORYGON is copy-
protected so it cannot be duplicated.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
Using the most advanced technologies,
scientists finally succeeded in making the
first artificial POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
A POKéMON that consists entirely of
programming code. It is capable of moving
freely in cyberspace.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
The world’s first artificially
created Pokémon. It can travel
through electronic space.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
The world’s first artificially
created Pokémon. It can travel
through electronic space.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A man-made Pokémon created using
advanced scientific means. It can
move freely in cyberspace.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
It is a manmade Pokémon. Since it
doesn’t breathe, people are eager
to try it in any environment.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
A manmade Pokémon that came about as
a result of research. It is programmed
with only basic motions.
flavor_text_entries.black:
A man-made Pokémon created using
advanced scientific means. It can
move freely in cyberspace.
flavor_text_entries.white:
A man-made Pokémon created using
advanced scientific means. It can
move freely in cyberspace.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
A man-made Pokémon created using
advanced scientific means. It can
move freely in cyberspace.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
A man-made Pokémon created using
advanced scientific means. It can
move freely in cyberspace.
flavor_text_entries.x:
A man-made Pokémon that came about
as a result of research. It is programmed
with only basic motions.
flavor_text_entries.y:
A Pokémon that consists entirely of programming
code. It is capable of moving freely in cyberspace.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Porygon is capable of reverting itself entirely back to program
data and entering cyberspace. This Pokémon is copy protected
so it cannot be duplicated by copying.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Porygon is capable of reverting itself entirely back to program
data and entering cyberspace. This Pokémon is copy protected
so it cannot be duplicated by copying.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
Roughly 20 years ago, it was artificially created,
utilizing the latest technology of the time.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
It can convert its body into digital data,
which enables it to enter cyberspace.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
This Pokémon was created using the
cutting-edge science of 20 years ago, so
many parts of it have since become obsolete.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
It was built 20 years ago by scientists who
dreamed of exploring space. Their dreams have
yet to come true.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu:
The only Pokémon that people anticipate
can fly into space. None has managed
the feat yet, however.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-eevee:
The only Pokémon that people anticipate
can fly into space. None has managed
the feat yet, however.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
State-of-the-art technology was used to create
Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokémon to be
created via computer programming.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
In recent years, this species has been very helpful
in cyberspace. These Pokémon will go around
checking to make sure no suspicious data exists.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
It has no discernible heartbeat and does not seem to draw
breath, and yet it appears to function without issue. I cannot
even begin to explain this utterly bizarre anomaly.
